name: DRILLER (itch) (NathmanCo)
description:
My first foray into game development. I've put some work into polishing it up but at a certain point need to just call it done and move on. 

Plenty was learnt from this little project, I had a wonderful time tackling each little challenge as it arose, like detecting individual key presses. Sean, if you're reading this, you were instrumental in overcoming that particular hurdle, among many others. Cheers my guy.
